channel.title: Possible one of the best combat system's on a project insanity base
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GvKbqUmPgyw
I've rewritten the maxHit formula, and the meleeDefence formula. mageAttack formula. and mageDefence formula.

item.title: Possible one of the best combat system's on a project insanity base
item.dc:creator: @Aintaro Aintaro
item.description:
@Aintaro wrote:

You can get the formula’s from wiki…

I love how you say 'Possible one of the best combat system’s on a project insanity base.

(sarcasm right?)

Read full topic

item.source: Possible one of the best combat system's on a project insanity base

item.title: Possible one of the best combat system's on a project insanity base
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=468349.msg3424018#msg3424018 date=1291766062]

Your all wrong…

In 08 he was running a Project Czar server called BoratScape.

I played BoratScape, never knew he was the one running it.

He was I think Co or Owner and Coder of the server, then he left for a bit and a few different people took over Shannon was one of them, then soon after that he was back, then soon after that it shut down and then he switched to the delta base, which was BoratScape for a bit?, and then changed to RiotScape?, which then he soon after that used Emulous and then used PI, and I don’t think he’s changed since.

EDIT: You might also know it by the other IP it used, dreamscape.no-ip.org
[/quote]Your hierarchy is bad.

He can’t use RiotScape then Emulous / PI as Emulous is the base of RiotScape, and RiotScape is the base of Project Insanity. ^.^[/quote]

RiotScape was delta based before he used Emulous.

Read full topic
item.source: Possible one of the best combat system's on a project insanity base

item.title: Possible one of the best combat system's on a project insanity base

@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“TimeTM, post:14, topic:372290”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=468349.msg3424013#msg3424013 date=1291765823]
Your all wrong…

In 08 he was running a Project Czar server called BoratScape.
[/quote]

I played BoratScape, never knew he was the one running it.[/quote]

He was I think Co or Owner and Coder of the server, then he left for a bit and a few different people took over Shannon was one of them, then soon after that he was back, then soon after that it shut down and then he switched to the delta base, which was BoratScape for a bit?, and then changed to RiotScape?, which then he soon after that used Emulous and then used PI, and I don’t think he’s changed since.

EDIT: You might also know it by the other IP it used, dreamscape.no-ip.org

Read full topic

item.title: Possible one of the best combat system's on a project insanity base
item.dc:creator: @TimeTM TimeTM
item.description:
@TimeTM wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:11, topic:372290”][quote author=TimeTM link=topic=468349.msg3423991#msg3423991 date=1291764982]

belongs in server development

Does not; he’s only showing the hit systems for a server, fairly popular, that is what’s called ‘the best’ hit system.

Of course; SabSabi has one of the greatest combat systems in PI servers of all time.
But it may not be as good as CrsisX’s, Lsm is an excellent coder.
I think his name is Lsm.

P.S. Lsm is CrisisX’s coder.

Lmc?

Yes, Lmc is the name.

I use to play his old server. Not many of you should know about it though… It was back in 08…

RiotScape, i know about it. Though i’ve never played it. Just used to mess around with his base.
[/quote]
Only the base he uses now, I don’t believe that’s the older server he had.[/quote]

Wasn’t his older server based of DeltaScape, i’ve read something about that.

Read full topic
item.source: Possible one of the best combat system's on a project insanity base

item.title: Possible one of the best combat system's on a project insanity base
item.dc:creator: @TimeTM TimeTM
item.description:
@TimeTM wrote:

The ranging system is still abit half-assed how ever i rewrote abit of it, to avoid constant 22s.

recker450:

belongs in server development

I don’t see how it does, i’m looking for feedback.

[quote=“Uncalled, post:2, topic:372290”]Of course; SabSabi has one of the greatest combat systems in PI servers of all time.
But it may not be as good as CrsisX’s, Lsm is an excellent coder.
I think his name is Lsm.

P.S. Lsm is CrisisX’s coder.[/quote]

Yeh, i know Ryan. I’m not even sure if he’s touched CrisisX’s combat. He’s fixed a few bugs toward it, that’s all i believe.

Read full topic
